name: overseerr-requester
title: Overseerr Requester
description: Request movies from your Overseerr instance directly from Raycast.
author: connor_pink

commands.name: media-browser
commands.title: Overseerr Requester
commands.subtitle: Request a movie on the Overseerr instance
commands.description: Using overseerr instance api search and request movies/shows and allow adding a request

preferences.name: apiUrl
preferences.title: Overseerr API URL
preferences.description: The URL of your Overseerr instance (e.g., https://overseerr.yourdomain.com/api/v1)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
